Event.name: Transfer_scenario
Event.definition:
<def-root>In this scenario, the <fen>Theme</fen> begins in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen> and ends up in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen>. Alternatively, these two participants may be jointly construed as <fen>Transferors</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and causes it to be in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Transferors
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Donor</fen> and <fen>Recipient</fen> conceived of as a unit.</def-root>
